languages.text: {n}Когда вы окидываете взглядом священные машины, расставленные по мостику, часть пиратов явно начинает нервничать — переглядываться и переминаться с ноги на ногу. Эти устройства, чем бы они ни были, представляют какую-то особую ценность.{/n}

{n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, several of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they carry some special importance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда вы окидываете взглядом священные машины, расставленные по мостику, часть пиратов явно начинает нервничать — переглядываться и переминаться с ноги на ногу. Эти устройства, чем бы они ни были, представляют какую-то особую ценность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, some of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they have some special importance.{/n}

{n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, several of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they carry some special importance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}En el instante en el que miras a las máquinas sagradas instaladas por todo el puente, los rostros de varios de los piratas revelan su nerviosismo. Intercambian miradas entre ellos y cambian el peso de un pie a otro. Sean lo que sean estos dispositivos, su importancia está clara.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, several of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they carry some special importance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En el instante en el que miras a las máquinas sagradas instaladas por todo el puente, los rostros de varios de los piratas revelan su nerviosismo. Intercambian miradas entre ellos y cambian el peso de un pie a otro. Sean lo que sean estos dispositivos, su importancia está clara.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你的目光落在舰桥周围的神圣机器上时，周围几个海盗明显变得紧张起来，一刻不停地交换眼神。虽然你不清楚这些机器究竟是做什么的，但很显然，它们极其重要。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, several of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they carry some special importance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你的目光落在舰桥周围的神圣机器上时，周围几个海盗明显变得紧张起来，一刻不停地交换眼神。虽然你不清楚这些机器究竟是做什么的，但很显然，它们极其重要。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'instant où votre regard se pose sur les machines sacrées installées aux quatre coins de la passerelle, la tension monte d'un cran et plusieurs pirates échangent des regards nerveux, en dansant d'un pied sur l'autre. Quelle que soit leur nature exacte, ces engins ne sont pas là par hasard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, several of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they carry some special importance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À l'instant où votre regard se pose sur les machines sacrées installées aux quatre coins de la passerelle, la tension monte d'un cran et plusieurs pirates échangent des regards nerveux, en dansant d'un pied sur l'autre. Quelle que soit leur nature exacte, ces engins ne sont pas là par hasard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ブリッジに設置された神聖なる機械に一瞥を与えた瞬間、複数の海賊が目に見えて弱きになり、顔を見合わせ、一歩ずつ退歩する。この機械が何であれ、何か重要な意味がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, several of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they carry some special importance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ブリッジに設置された神聖なる機械に一瞥を与えた瞬間、複数の海賊が目に見えて弱きになり、顔を見合わせ、一歩ずつ退歩する。この機械が何であれ、何か重要な意味がある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Köprüde kurulu olan kutsal makinelere göz attığında anda korsanlardan birkaçının gerildiğini ve birbirlerine bakıp ayaklarını huzursuzca salladıklarını fark ediyorsun. Bu cihazlar her neyse oldukça önemliler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The moment you glance at the sacred machines installed around the bridge, several of the pirates grow visibly nervous, exchanging looks and shifting from one foot to another. Whatever these devices are, they carry some special importance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Köprüde kurulu olan kutsal makinelere göz attığında anda korsanlardan birkaçının gerildiğini ve birbirlerine bakıp ayaklarını huzursuzca salladıklarını fark ediyorsun. Bu cihazlar her neyse oldukça önemliler.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du die heiligen Maschinen auf der Brücke betrachtest, werden einige der Piraten sichtlich nervös und treten unschlüssig von einem Fuß auf den anderen. Egal, worum es sich bei diesen Geräten handelt, sie haben eine besondere Bedeutung.{/n}
